Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Varv peptide E (Varv E; Plant defensin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.14987049]Human cancer cell lines:U-937 GTB (lymphoma) (IC50=4 µM), RPMI-8226/s (myeloma) (IC50=4 µM).[Ref.18008336]Virus:HIV:inhibition the cytopathic effects of HIV-1 infection in cultured human T-lymphoblast (CEM-SS) cells(EC50=350 nM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.20580652] HD50=6.96µM against human type O red blood cells.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.20580652] Cytotoxicity:U251(IC50=38.84μg/mL), MDA-MB-231(IC50>10μg/mL), A549(IC50>10μg/mL), DU145(IC50>10μg/mL), BEL-7402(IC50>10μg/mL).[Ref.14987049] Cytotoxicity:U-937 GTB (lymphoma)(IC50 = 4 µM) and RPMI-8226/s (myeloma)(IC50 = 4 µM).[Ref.18008336]CEM-SS cells:IC50=3980 nM.
Sequence Information.Function: Probably participates in a plant defense mechanism. Has cytotoxic activity against human lymphoma U-937 GTB and human myeloma RPMI-8226/s cell lines.
